DOC.detailed_description: An interventional study perform 3 hemodialysis hospital unit ( La Princesa University Hospital , Príncipe de Asturias University Hospital Infanta Leonor University Hospital , Community Madrid , Spain ) usual dialyzer patient OLHDF replace Solacea™ dialyzer keep rest parameter unchanged . The study ( LIB 09/2015 ) review approve CEIC Príncipe de Asturias University Hospital . - Design study Each patient underwent 12 session haemodialysis usual schedule monitor : 5008 Fresenius ( n=14 ) , AK200US ( n=5 ) Artis Gambro ( n=3 ) DBB007 Nikkiso ( n=1 ) suitable OLHDF , although different convective transport control system . The nursing staff connect automatic OLHDF system . In case system Ultracontrol® ( Gambro monitor ) alarm PTM > 300 mmHg system pressure ( PSist ) > 700 mmHg appear solve , Ultracontrol® would withdraw pressure-control system would use . - Data collect : 1 . The filtration fraction ( FF ) calculate percentage Qi relative Qb . The convective volume ( Vconv ) define total ultra-filtrated volume , sum VI UF.7 2 . Analytical determination 1 . For protein bound substances β2-microglobulin concentration end session correct haemoconcentration correction factor ( FC ) base plasma protein concentration ( PT ) : FC = PTpre / PTpos , PTpre PTpos total concentration proteins pre-dialysis post-dialysis . -- - Statistical analysis All data collect database ( SPSS version 15 ) .
